item.title: Alex King

item.content:encoded:
I’m very sad to hear that Alex King passed away this week.

I’d crossed paths with Alex several times over the years. He was a speaker at the very first WordCamp in Utah. Later I returned the favor speaking at a WordCamp in Denver. I enjoyed our conversations, he was always thoughtful and fun.

I, along with many others, will miss him. My thoughts and prayers are with his family.
